options.content:
# OADP Pull CI Dashboard
# THIS IS STILL A WIP, validating data

## Useful links
* Search for errors:  https://search.ci.openshift.org/  
* Test Grid: https://testgrid.k8s.io/redhat
* OADP CI Config: https://github.com/openshift/release/tree/master/ci-operator/config/openshift/oadp-operator
      
## builds
* upstream: https://app.travis-ci.com/github/openshift/oadp-operator
* downstream: https://jenkins-cpaas-oadp.apps.cpaas-poc.r6c9.p1.openshiftapps.com/
* internal cvp: https://jenkins-cvp-5d6ccd93bed8bd3809ddcb5d.apps.ocp-c1.prod.psi.redhat.com/view/Production%20Pipeline/job/cvp-product-test/

targets.query: SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.8.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.8.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.8.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.6.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.6.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.6.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*aws.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*aws.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*aws.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*gcp.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*gcp.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*gcp.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*azure.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*azure.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*azure.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "state_int", "build_id", "end_time", "duration", "log" FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*aws.*/  ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "state_int", "build_id", "end_time", "duration", "log" FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*gcp.*/  ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "state_int", "build_id", "end_time", "duration", "log" FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.9.*azure.*/  ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.8.*aws.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.8.*aws.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.8.*aws.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.8.*gcp.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.8.*gcp.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.8.*gcp.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.8.*azure.*/  AND "state" = 'success' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.8.*azure.*/  AND "state" = 'failure' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /.*4.8.*azure.*/  AND "state" = 'aborted' ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "state_int",  "duration",   "build_id", "log" FROM "build" WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.8.*aws.*/  ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "state_int",  "duration",   "build_id", "log" FROM "build" WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.8.*gcp.*/  ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "state_int",  "duration",   "build_id", "log" FROM "build" WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.8.*azure.*/  ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*aws.*/  AND "state_int" = 0 ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*aws.*/  AND "state_int"= 2 ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*aws.*/  AND "state_int" = 4 ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*gcp.*/  AND "state_int" = 0 ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*gcp.*/  AND "state_int"= 2 ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*gcp.*/  AND "state_int" = 4 ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*.azure*/  AND "state_int" = 0 ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*.azure*/  AND "state_int"= 2 ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("state") FROM "build"  WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*azure.*/  AND "state_int" = 4 ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "state_int",  "duration",   "build_id", "log" FROM "build" WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*aws.*/  ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "state_int",  "duration",   "build_id", "log" FROM "build" WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*gcp.*/  ) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "job_name", "state_int",  "duration",   "build_id", "log" FROM "build" WHERE ("job_name" =~ /^periodic.*4.7.*azure.*/  ) AND $timeFilter
